SENTENCE.STRING: (කොළඹ in Sinhala; கொழுமுபு in Tamil) is the largest city and commercial capital of Sri Lanka, located on the southwest coast adjacent to the present administrative capital of Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte.
The name Colombo is derived from the Sinhala name Kola-amba-thota which means "harbour with leafy mango trees".
